tool_description: Creates searchable indexes from journal entries to enable fast text search and content discovery.

entry_contents.description: Array of journal entry texts to index

index_metadata.description: Whether to include metadata in the search index

case_sensitive.description: Whether the search index should be case sensitive

include_stemming.description: Whether to use word stemming for broader matching

error_messages: No content provided: Supply at least one journal entry text for indexing.
Too many entries: Maximum 5000 entries can be indexed in a single operation.
Index creation failed: Unable to create search index from provided content.
usage: Provide entry_contents array for indexing. Enable metadata inclusion and stemming for enhanced search capabilities. Set case sensitivity based on search requirements. Returns searchable index ready for queries.

index_status.description: Status of the index creation process

index_size.description: Size of the created index in terms of unique terms
